author: Duane Smith
comment: Like it a lot. I don't have an Android watch, glad to see that this works on a phone. The selection of colors and faces is nice, more would be welcome. Maybe add time of solar noon? For a while I thought the shadow was reversed, if you point 12  noon North, the shadow is correctly oriented.

author: Charles kluepfel
comment: Interesting view. Like the sunrise and sunset: bigger font than on F04 watch face. BUT...  the black font color of the sunrise/set times is unreadable on the dark blue background of the nighttime face. The color of the sunrise/set font should also switch at night, like the color of the time. I've only had the face for a day, so I don't recall if the date was also in an unreadable font color; if so, the same applies to that.

reply.author: Watchmasters
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback and suggestion. We have updated our app and now the font of the sunrise/sunset time changes its color at night exactly like the colors of the date and time. Now the sunrise/sunset become fully readable at anytime. We hope you’ll enjoy the new look.

author: Oleg Yushko
comment: Nice one! Interesting idea! Beautiful colors. It’s a lot of fun also to change location on the map and see how the shadow and the hour lines change.

author: Davids Heart
comment: Wow, amazing. Never've seen such watches. Just cool! Love it :)
